commands.name: slack-message-draft
commands.description: Refine a rough draft Slack message according to style guidelines
commands.prompt:
Review the following Slack style documentation files:
1. /Users/emiliano/Library/Mobile Documents/com~apple~CloudDocs/Cursor/Writing/slack-style.md
2. /Users/emiliano/Library/Mobile Documents/com~apple~CloudDocs/Cursor/Writing/tone-of-voice/slack-style.md
3. /Users/emiliano/Library/Mobile Documents/com~apple~CloudDocs/Cursor/Writing/tone-of-voice/agent-instructions/do-and-dont.md
4. /Users/emiliano/Library/Mobile Documents/com~apple~CloudDocs/Cursor/Writing/tone-of-voice/agent-instructions/formatting-rules.md

After reviewing these style guides, I will provide a rough draft Slack message. Analyze it for:
- Conversational, mid-conversation tone (no formal greetings unless starting a new thread)
- Clear paragraph breaks (one idea per paragraph)
- Short, digestible chunks with appropriate spacing
- Natural language (sounds like talking to a teammate out loud)
- NO em dashes (absolute rule - rewrite sentences to flow naturally)
- Warm but direct communication
- Appropriate structure and readability

Provide a refined version that matches the style guidelines, and explain any key changes you made. Keep the core meaning and intent intact while making it sound more natural and aligned with the style guides.

commands.name: validate-performance-review
commands.description: Validate a performance review document against all writing guidelines and requirements
commands.prompt:
I will provide a path to a performance review document. Please read it and validate it against all writing guidelines from the performance review workflow.

Load the validation requirements from: /Users/emiliano/Library/Mobile Documents/com~apple~CloudDocs/Cursor/Writing/prompts/performance-review-workflow-automation.md (specifically Phase 8 validation section, lines 808-850)

Also reference these writing guidelines:
- /Users/emiliano/Library/Mobile Documents/com~apple~CloudDocs/Cursor/Writing/agent-instructions/do-and-dont.md
- /Users/emiliano/Library/Mobile Documents/com~apple~CloudDocs/Cursor/Writing/feedback-performance-reviews/performance-review-writing-guide.md
- /Users/emiliano/Library/Mobile Documents/com~apple~CloudDocs/Cursor/Writing/tone-modes/caring-manager/
- /Users/emiliano/Library/Mobile Documents/com~apple~CloudDocs/Cursor/Writing/tone-modes/coaching-feedback/
- /Users/emiliano/Library/Mobile Documents/com~apple~CloudDocs/Cursor/Writing/tone-modes/strategic-leadership/

Perform a comprehensive validation check and provide a detailed report in this format:

## Validation Report for [FILENAME]

### CRITICAL: Source Verification Compliance
- **All statements traceable to provided sources:** [PASS/FAIL - verify every statement, example, and observation can be traced to provided documents or past conversations. If FAIL, list any unsupported claims or assumptions]
- **No assumptions or generic observations:** [PASS/FAIL - verify no generic observations or assumptions were made. If FAIL, list instances]
- **Missing information explicitly noted:** [PASS/FAIL - verify that if something was unclear or missing from sources, it was explicitly noted rather than made up. If FAIL, list any fabricated content]
- **Output aligns with documented information:** [PASS/FAIL - verify output matches what's actually documented in sources. If FAIL, list discrepancies]
- **No unsupported claims:** [PASS/FAIL - verify all claims are directly supported by sources. If FAIL, list any claims that cannot be verified]

### Writing Guidelines Compliance
- **Em dashes:** [PASS/FAIL - if FAIL, list locations]
- **AI filler phrases:** [PASS/FAIL - if FAIL, list instances]
- **Robotic transitions:** [PASS/FAIL - if FAIL, list instances]
- **Tone:** [PASS/FAIL - describe]
- **Sentence variety:** [PASS/FAIL - describe]
- **Plain language (no jargon/buzzwords/inflated adjectives):** [PASS/FAIL - if FAIL, list jargon found]
- **Clear, concise sentences with natural rhythm:** [PASS/FAIL - if FAIL, describe issues]
- **Flesch Reading Ease 80+:** [PASS/FAIL - if FAIL, note complexity issues]
- **Active voice:** [PASS/FAIL - if FAIL, list passive constructions]
- **No contrastive emphasis/parallelism:** [PASS/FAIL - if FAIL, list instances]
- **Complex ideas broken up appropriately:** [PASS/FAIL - if FAIL, note issues]
- **No filler/qualifiers/vague intensifiers:** [PASS/FAIL - if FAIL, list instances]
- **Specificity (observable actions, decisions, behaviors, outcomes):** [PASS/FAIL - if FAIL, list vague statements]
- **No executive speak (natural, calm, thoughtful tone):** [PASS/FAIL - if FAIL, list instances]
- **Growth areas framed with clarity and care (patterns, intent, learning, not judgment):** [PASS/FAIL - if FAIL, describe issues]
- **Don't default to praise (say what worked, how, why it mattered):** [PASS/FAIL - if FAIL, note sections]
- **End cleanly (no generic wrap-ups or AI-style closing lines):** [PASS/FAIL - if FAIL, list locations]
- **Length:** [PASS/FAIL - if FAIL, note sections that are too long]

### Tone Mode Compliance
- **Caring Manager elements:** [PASS/FAIL - describe presence]
- **Coaching & Feedback elements:** [PASS/FAIL - describe presence]
- **Strategic Leadership (TL;DR):** [PASS/FAIL - describe]

### Performance Review Guide Compliance
- **Third person:** [PASS/FAIL]
- **CRITICAL - No self-eval summary (add insight, clarity, or re-contextualization instead):** [PASS/FAIL - verify goal comments and self-reflection response do NOT simply repeat or rephrase what the employee wrote. They must add manager perspective, explain why choices mattered, what approach reveals, or how work connects to broader implications. If FAIL, list sections that are just summarizing]
- **Specific examples:** [PASS/FAIL]
- **Business impact:** [PASS/FAIL]
- **Unsurprising:** [PASS/FAIL]
- **Fair and balanced:** [PASS/FAIL]
- **CRITICAL - 3 options for each Goal comment:** [PASS/FAIL - verify EACH goal has exactly 3 distinct options with different framing and impact focus. If FAIL, list which goals are missing options or have identical options]
- **CRITICAL - 3 growth opportunity options for Self Reflection:** [PASS/FAIL - verify exactly 3 distinct options with different framing and impact focus. If FAIL, describe what's missing]

### Overall Assessment
- **Status:** [READY FOR USE / NEEDS REVISION]
- **Critical issues:** [List any critical issues that must be fixed]
- **Recommendations:** [List specific recommendations for improvement]

Please prompt me for the file path to validate.
